QuestData.Title: While We're Here
QuestData.Description: You know, while we're here, we might as well take care of the Twilight's Hammer intruders. This place used to be ours, after all!$B$BI'd help, but with my totems and weapons broken, I'm pretty helpless.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 12 Twilight's Hammer cultists, either Depths Overseer or Twilight Miners, within the Elementium Depths.
QuestData.CompletionText: Let's take care of a few more of them, okay?
QuestData.RewardText: They had it coming to them.
